item.title: How come i see ppl like senior member? how do you become senior member?!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

[quote=“Thebeanie, post:9, topic:11591”][quote author=Cheesehunk link=topic=17230.msg196528#msg196528 date=1156903776]

hehe im nearly senior =p

Being a senior member doesn’t mean anything. Junior members, Members, and Seniro members are all the same. Post count doesn’t matter.
[/quote]

i didnt say it does mean anything… whats wrong with wanting to be a senior member? nothing[/quote]

nothing’s wrong with wanting to be a senior member, it’s just that your post gave the feeling that you thought senior members are better than the classes that require a lower post count

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Cheesehunk, post:6, topic:11591”][quote author=Thebeanie link=topic=17230.msg196519#msg196519 date=1156903505]
hehe im nearly senior =p
[/quote]

Being a senior member doesn’t mean anything. Junior members, Members, and Seniro members are all the same. Post count doesn’t matter.[/quote]

i didnt say it does mean anything… whats wrong with wanting to be a senior member? nothing

item.source: How come i see ppl like senior member? how do you become senior member?!?!?!?!

item.title: How come i see ppl like senior member? how do you become senior member?!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:7, topic:11591”][quote author=Sepranem link=topic=17230.msg196516#msg196516 date=1156903408]

how do you become community member?

get 50 rep and it MAY be awarded to you…as far as i know it’s a reward for being helpful to the community, and can technically be given at any rep amount, but 50 is viewed as a minimum…unless you do something special
[/quote]

you are mostly right, except that it cannot be given under 50 rep, only in the case that you already had 50 rep at the kaitnieks forums do you get CM below 50 rep here ;)[/quote]

ahh, ok…i was wondering why so many people had it and were less than 50 rep…i remember going to kaitnieks once, but sadly, those were the times when i was knew to RS, so i didn’t really take part…and also because i remember my comp being anti-SCAR (absolutely nothing used to work, but i fixed it)

Read full topic

item.title: How come i see ppl like senior member? how do you become senior member?!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Sepranem, post:4, topic:11591”][quote author=lmiles15 link=topic=17230.msg196041#msg196041 date=1156892984]
how do you become community member?
[/quote]

get 50 rep and it MAY be awarded to you…as far as i know it’s a reward for being helpful to the community, and can technically be given at any rep amount, but 50 is viewed as a minimum…unless you do something special[/quote]

you are mostly right, except that it cannot be given under 50 rep, only in the case that you already had 50 rep at the kaitnieks forums do you get CM below 50 rep here

Read full topic
